website_summaries.verdict: Suitable for those looking for a solid, reasonably priced island to fill a smaller space.
pros: A stable, smaller island that can be put together in under an hour
cons: The top can be difficult to install correctly
The drawer is a little flimsy and can’t hold much weight

customer_reviews.title: It's a good island for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a good island for the price. I bought 2 of these and put them side by side so now for under $300 I have a 40x40 nice kitchen island.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Twitty

customer_reviews.title: Great size and price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Kitchen cart. I bought it for my brother's apt. We were able to fit his microwave, food processor, blender and toaster on the counter. The drawer is very spacious and it's a great height. It was also easy to assemble. One tip when screwing the counter top, do not tighten the screws all the way, because the rest of the holes will be misaligned.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle V.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage... very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a complete waste of money, and I do not have the time or patience to pack it back up for return. It wobbles, I cannot get the drawer to fit. The holes don't line up, and the directions do not have detailed enough photos to show me if I made a mistake. I am beyond disappointed. This product is cheap and poorly designed. There is no doubt in my mind that the positive reviews are fake. There is absolutely no way that a product this flimsy can have such strong reviews. I wish Amazon would do something about fake reviews.
customer_reviews.author: SPB

customer_reviews.title: Junk (you get *less* than you pay for)
customer_reviews.text: Poor fit and finish. Frame of the table made of soft, brittle wood. Screws never fully "bite" while assembled, and portions of the frame cracked. Leg height uneven. Final kicker - (probably due to poor choice of/incorrectly factory assembled rails), drawer completely stuck, after inserting it all you can do is pull the entire table by its handle. See video for details.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: and provides great extra work and storage space for a smaller kitchen ...
customer_reviews.text: It is well made, ALL REAL WOOD, and provides great extra work and storage space for a smaller kitchen or dining room. I love it. However, I saw this item on Overstock.com for $10 less than Amazon but I love Amazon's great customer service so I spent the extra money to order from Amazon. When the item came the packaging slip was from Overstock.com. and I was instructed to return it to Overstock.com if there was a problem. The item was so perfect that I bought a second one from Overstock.com directly; saved $10 plus tax. Worth the money, but by it from Overstock.com and save the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Reinke

customer_reviews.title: Very low quality product
customer_reviews.text: The top of the table and shelves have knicks in the finish. One leg is shorter which makes it rock really bad. The drawer does not close completely on both sides and it swings open. The item looks better in pictures than in person. I would not recommend this product and if so something similar from a store or reputable store's website. The seller told me via email that the drawer is not supposed to close completely and I can just put rubber under the leg.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. K

customer_reviews.title: Majority of the table is fine but the drawer doesn't fit well
customer_reviews.text: Majority of the table is fine but the drawer doesn't fit well. The front of the drawer scrapes the front of the table when you close it and one of the back wheels won't stay in the railing, causing the back of the drawer to hang down. I bought a similar looking table off craigslist and that one is solid, so maybe I just got a dud. Didn't find the drawer problems until I assembled the whole thing so not worth it to disassemble and send it back. Next time I'll stick to Ikea or other well-known brand.
customer_reviews.author: Beaker

customer_reviews.title: Drawer doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: The island is fine, reasonably sturdy and seems like it would hold up well. The problem is the drawer, it is too small so it doesn’t ride on the rails correctly and jams when you open it, requiring that you jiggle it violently and curse to get the thing to open.
customer_reviews.author: mm357

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After searching and searching and reading all the reviews I felt great about this little table!! Unfortunately I am so disappointed. While trying to put it together I realized the legs aren’t all even! Different sizes do the holes don’t line up for the screws! I though “well maybe it’ll be ok”. So I contributed to put it together and see what happens. Wrong decision. The table is so off, it’s wobbly and terrible. I can’t let my kids use the table because it’s so wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Cjannellv

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for ...
customer_reviews.text: This product gets points for its design, function and price, but loses points for quality of materials and craftsmanship . The wood dents very easily (there were a few indentations in the wood) plus there were two screws missing for the drawer handle and the paint job was uneven and shoddy. The table arrived on time and the box was intact and not damaged at all. It was easy to assemble and it suits our needs for now. I wish the manufacturer choose to use better quality materials and craftsmanship, I would have been willing to pay more for better quality. The design is very practical and I hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: NJ wise

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid piece!
customer_reviews.text: I have a tiny studio apartment and I bought this for counter space (there was virtually not an inch of counter space in the apartment) and also storage since I have a mini kitchen. This is the perfect height, feels like actual counter space. Has enough storage where all of my appliances fit perfectly and I can use the drawer for silverware and other random kitchen accessories. It was also fairly simple to put together. I’ve only ever built two other pieces of furniture and this was by far the easiest. It’s very sturdy. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: BLZ

customer_reviews.title: Nice island Perfect size Real Wood.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this island , made with real wood Pine I think, easy to assemble top was the hardest part , should have flipped it upside down to install screws for top instead of having to reach upwards. Drawer is alright fits my saran wrap and in foil , bags.... the shelves ae nice and sturdy and can hold a plethora of items. I may buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Seve99

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something for my coffee pot and microwave to free up space on my counter top in my small kitchen. The cart I had was way to wide and took up a lot of value space. This island fit the bill perfectly. The shelves are just spacious enough for a 10x17 microwave. The drawer is small and narrow but it serves the purpose for what I needed. I would have given it 4 stars, but the top was a bit difficult and awkward to attach. I really wish they would go back to phillip head screws. All in all a really nice piece of kitchen furniture.
customer_reviews.author: DarleneSp57

customer_reviews.title: SO CUTE, love it!
customer_reviews.text: excuse the mess in the picture. i purchased this to go in the kitchen of a home we just purchased. i wanted something functioning, but small, but large enough for things. i also did not want to break the bank and had a difficult time finding the colors i wanted (my kitchen is browns and blacks). it was VERY easy to set up- my fiance and i sat on the kitchen floor after a long day of painting and ripping up carpet. took about an hour- the directions are SO EASY and very straight forward. it is light weight. i would highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nmarie

customer_reviews.title: Used or poor paint job who knows....?
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews.... But this is just too much. It looks like someone had it before me and tried to repaint it? It has scuff marks and bloobs of paint everywhere. I just moved and am having guest over so I need something this weekend to use. I would've returned it promptly if it didn't take so long to get here all ready. 😢
customer_reviews.author: LoLo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Table and Stools
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what we were looking for! Solid wood construction and easy to assemble (about 20 minutes).
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Geer

customer_reviews.title: but it is not sturdy at all
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item for extra kitchen storage. Took longer to arrive then excepted. When it did arrive one of the shelves had only about a third of the slats attached to the frame. It was only because my husband can fix just about anything I kept it. He was able to put cart together, but it is not sturdy at all. Would not be comfortable putting anything more then a couple of pounds on either shelf. It does look nice. Like the top very much. Drawer works well, but there is a much wider gap on one side then the other. I would not purchase again nor would I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: LLinda Moore

customer_reviews.title: Quite happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Reading some of the reviews I didn't know what to expect from this item. One review said it isn't even wood. (yes, it is wood. NOT exotic wood but wood.) Another said breaks easily. (I guess they are rougher than I.) I put it together myself in an hour. Instructions and supplies were just right. Screws fit well into screw holes and the only real problem I had with it was the way the drawer guide goes together. I couldn't really see the drawing well enough so I did have to redo that, But otherwise, it was easy, seems sturdy, and holds a lot. I even got the cat fountain on the bottom shelf. Would buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: pmd

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat this for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this kitchen island. Took me searching on multiple websites/stores for weeks for one of these, at an affordable price, to help create more space in my teeny tiny kitchen. After hours of debating between this and a few other ones on amazon i decided to go w the open look, and, on the plus side, it was cheeper than almost every other one I considered. The only reson i gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is due to the super lengthy delivery wait. Other than that it's perfect. Took my boyfriend (who isn't the handiest of people) 45 min to put it together. We are both super happy with it! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Need a little extra kitchen space?
customer_reviews.text: A little extra space goes a long way! Directions were relatively easy to understand and I was able to assemble by myself. Strong enough to hold my small kitchen appliances like my 12 quart air fryer and 8 quart instant pot. My only gripe is that I wish it was a little taller with enough space in between the shelves to fit my instant pot & blender with out removing the lid or blender jar. Overall, I’m happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece and will work out good
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I wanted, although I wish the top was 24” deep and the drawer was 2-3” deeper. Easy to put together and I did it in less than 30 min. Directions were fine for me. It is quite sturdy. The drawer was easy to put together and slides in and out well, although a couple of those screws didn’t bite as good the drawer is still sturdy. I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: LifesMyPuzzle

customer_reviews.title: Great looking sturdy shelf
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted. It is sturdy enough to hold a large microwave on top shelf and multiple smaller kitchen appliances/items on the 2 shelves below. After making sure that I had all of the required parts and screws, it took me about 45 minutes to assemble. Each part was labeled, and the instructions were very clear. I replaced an outdated, smaller microwave shelf/table. It looks great in my kitchen and has so much more storage. I added small, felt pads on the bottom of the legs so that it easily moves on the tile floor.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Walker

customer_reviews.title: Love it as a center island in my older house in my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Took me alone 30 minutes to assemble. Looks great. The downsides. The drawer is a little small not much height to it and the drawer does feel cheap. But the rest of the unit is amazing its a decent size has quite a bit of storage underneath. I'm just a little worried about the top and either scratching or burning it if i were to put something on it so i am going to look at putting a epoxy or laquor coating on it just to protect it.
customer_reviews.author: MJTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a studio apartment with little storage space and an extra tiny kitchen that doesn't leave much room for essentials. I searched all over Amazon to find the perfect island to hold my microwave, keurig, toaster, and other items. This fit the bill so I took a chance based on the reviews. I was not disappointed! It's beautiful, sturdy enough for my needs, and can hold all of my things. It's important to note that the drawer does not hold heavy items, so I use it to store extra k-cups and instant oatmeal packets. It's gotten a lot of use so far and many compliments. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Functional, good quality and attractive.
customer_reviews.text: I needed an extra storage table in the kitchen and wanted one the same height as the stove island. This was on sale and looked nice. It came when I was at work. My son and his friend assembled it in an hour and had it set up in the kitchen before I came home. The drawer glides nicely , and it serves the exact purpose I was looking for. It's very nice looking to boot!
customer_reviews.author: Wise Kim

customer_reviews.title: Lovely tables, great height, lots of storage!
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent! They look lovely in the room, are the perfect height to work at while standing, and have SO much storage space. I was pleased with how easy they were to put together, took me about half an hour to assemble the two that I got. The drawers do have an issue with the screws in the sliding tracks, but it's an easy fix. The screws in back were not flush with the track (the heads were too large for the slot they were in and the drawer caught on them) so we moved the screws to a larger slot and all was well.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Great piece!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our office coffee cart and its perfect! We have had it a while now and its held up very well. The top is wood, and easy to clean. The metal shelves are sturdy and look great, too. We have had no issues with this island at all. It looks just as the pictures show and has been a great addition to our little breakroom area. Its large, too, it holds our Keurig, a teapot, and a large water jug dispenser thing. The shelves below hold all our coffee supplies, cups, various other items. We bought the black and love it!
customer_reviews.author: DZKimmi

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these and loved it so much I immediately purchased a second one. One is my coffee station and one is for our small fish tank. The quality is fantastic and the packaging made sense. I hope no one orders this and gets a “dud” or that the company makes a change that impacts quality, but I wanted to let you know I bought two and they are both wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: ArmyWife

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with this kitchen cart! The shipping came early and I was so excited to receive it that I immediately put it together by myself on a Friday night. Are usually don’t put things together but I wanted to give this a try and it was so easy to assemble. The instructions were very clear and all the parts came package and labeled and I was just able to do this in 45 minutes. The kitchen cart is so sturdy and I love the way it looks and I cook all the time so I’m so happy to add this to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Mimilatrice

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful island
customer_reviews.text: I received this as my mother days present cause i desperately needed something to separate my kitchen from everything else (L shaped) I really like it. I haven’t cut anything or placed anything hot on it so I’m not 100% sure on the durability of the top but the rest has been holding up good. The ONLY thing is the towel rack on the side. It doesn’t really make sense it’s difficult to put a cloth on it. Idk just something I don’t mess with.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Juriga

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed at the end...
customer_reviews.text: Everything was working well, until I got to the drawer part. The screws that are suppose to go on the side panel for the drawer suddenly became loose. It wouldn't attach! I checked and the screws had made huge holes in the wood so it wouldn't attach together. So now I had to buy wood glue, put it on last night and wait and see if it works. So dissapointed...it's a nice island table but the quality of the wood sucks! ....oh and the drawer was missing a screw also .....hopefully the stupid thing don't fall apart. Smh
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L. Velazquez

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and looks nice!
customer_reviews.text: Got this to put up against a wall to increase my counter space. Works great as extra counter! The top cleans off easily and it doesn't wabble when I'm using it. The shelves in the bottom are far enough apart to hold large items, which is nice. The drawer just under the countertop isn't huge. It was not too difficult to assemble. It might help to have 2 people. Lining up the screws that go up into the bottom of the counter was difficult, but we got it after a couple of trys.
customer_reviews.author: SoccerJo

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited about this piece! I needed something to provide more storage and counter space for my rustic-themed, but small kitchen and this island is PERFECT! It stands as tall as my counters, if not a smidge higher, and is cute from the front and back sides! I love the towel holder on the left side and the wood on the top is so much cuter and rustic than the factory picture shows!! My only issue is that the drawer is not the smoothest to open and close... but that may be fixable with some tinkering! I also love that it’s light enough for me (a petite woman) to move around- but it’s not on wheels!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Great "Cottage Type" Island
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product, especially for the price. It was easy to assemble with the Allan Wrench provided. The island is very sturdy, has ample storage on the 2 lower shelves, and the top is a large and great working area. The island is sitting right next to my stove, and the extra working space has enhanced my kitchen! The 2 lower shelves are wonderful for holding items like crockpots, large pots and pans, and my rice cooker. And the drawer is perfect for smaller items that need to be at hand when cooking. The color is perfect, and the entire piece has a very "cottage" feel, which is part of the reason I bought it. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!
customer_reviews.author: Presela Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: We moved into a new home that lacked storage and counter space. We needed a temporary fix for our dilemma and after scouring reviews for many similar products we decided on this one. It's been several months now and it has held up very well to chopping (with a cutting board) and other cooking operations on top of it. We use it to store pots and pans and the shelves have not buckled under the weight. As far as I can tell, this is made out of 100% wood which was a draw for us since particle board furniture doesn't typically last very long.
customer_reviews.author: mikecrave

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly
customer_reviews.text: I needed a lil bit more counter space. The built in shelving was a nice bonus too. My only gripe is that I followed the instructions (which were very user friendly), but the drawer ended up not being able to slide in due to two parts being mislabeled. Fortunately it was an easy fix and the drawer now slides in and out without any unnecessary resistance. I'm usually horrible at self-assembly, but I didn't have any issues outside the mislabeled parts. So if you think you can't do this yourself, you probably can.
customer_reviews.author: Rob P

customer_reviews.title: This product was simple to put together and seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This product was wrapped up very nicely. All pieces were individually wrapped and the box came without a dent. However, as you can see by the photos, there were large scratches on the top. This could only have happened in the factory because the shipping package and wrapping were undamaged. I am very upset about the scratches because they are right in the middle on the top. If the scratches were anywhere else it would not have mattered, but I am trying to get a replacement top. All in all, it is a very nice product and my wife really loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Kopsi Datta

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Junk wobbles all over and can't be tightened all the way... the table legs are not even...
customer_reviews.author: nicole russo

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for
customer_reviews.text: Overall fairly happy with it. As the title suggestions, you get what you paid for Very easy to install and put together. However, just opening the box, I immediately saw a chip on the on the corner of the countertop piece. It isn’t very big but definitely noticeable. Opted to have that piece on the back side to hide it some and you wouldn’t even notice it. Don’t hold your breathe for the pull out storage as the drawer isn’t very sturdy and the drawer doesn’t pull out very smoothly. Fairly sturdy construction though. Currently being used to hold some kitchen appliances and so far it’s been pretty good!
customer_reviews.author: David To

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised with this great buy.
customer_reviews.text: This is sturdy and helped expand space in a kitchen with few counters. I also needed another drawer which could hold my silverware. I didn’t see any shipment damage. You will need a Phillips screwdriver to assemble this. People who have come by were pleasantly surprised I bought this off Amazon and not a furniture place of some sort. I’m 5’3” and weigh about 190 and assembled this in one hour. The counter top part had a little weight to it lol. For the money, absolutely awesome purchase. I wish the drawer was about 2 more inches long in length because I had to turn my silverware tray sideways to fit. The actual silverware is from Amazon too.
customer_reviews.author: Lostnfoun

customer_reviews.title: Great for extra surface and storage and features price!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the old timey kitchen in our rental house. It lacks counter space and this was perfect for the extra surface area we needed! We cook a lot! Also, I used the two shelves underneath for storing appliances and potatoes and onions. Really gave us extra storage in our tiny kitchen! Now that we’re buying a house, I’m finding it hard to part with as our new kitchen will have plenty of counter space but not so much for the island. I’ll see if I can make it work. This thing is worth it!!! Believe me.
customer_reviews.author: Flossy

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Tall
customer_reviews.text: This is a great counter height island. Easy to assemble and solid - which was good, because I needed the towel rack on the opposite side. With particle board it would have been hard to not mess it up, but solid wood? Just a couple holes drilled.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the reviews and it did not disappoint! The wrench to put it together is not fabulous. But that was a description in one of the reviews so I just grabbed a wrench from my husband’s toolbox that is much stronger/ shorter to allow for the turning of the screws when applying the top. I was very impressed with how sturdy this is. Would buy it again. I am a firm believer in reviews of products on Amazon and the past customers did not let me down. I put this together by myself taking my time in approximately 40 minutes or less It comes packaged extremely well protecting all of the wood
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Sturdy Construction!
customer_reviews.text: We had been looking for a simple island for prep work and we fell in love with this one from Home Depot. While they don't carry them in-store, they do online. It arrived a day ahead of schedule and according to the husband, the directions were easy to follow and the only tool he needed was the allen wrench provided and a phillips head screwdriver. It is heavy and well built with a long drawer on one side where we keep our knives and cutting boards with plenty of storage underneath. We put two butcher block stools on either end and enjoyed our tea there!
customer_reviews.author: Pirate Patty Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but very wobbly
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. I feel like I got suckered into buying this by all the positive reviews. Don't get me wrong this thing looks great assembled, but is super unstable! Don't even think about trying to do any kind of kitchen prep work on it. If you bump into it, don't be surprised if it falls apart. The drawer is kinda crappy but it works. Assembly was a little annoying but not terrible. Overall the thing looks great, but is designed horrendously and as a result it is unstable and wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Lieber

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I usually don’t write product review until after using it for a while. However, I just got it a few days ago and so far it’s great! Quality and craftsmanship are both very good. I also like the color theme which does not clash with the rest of kitchen. It replaces the previous metal shelf we had and adds a nice counter top and storage space. Overall I am very pleased with this inexpensive but qualitative kitchen island.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm quite impressed with this kitchen island. My only complaint is that the drawer isn't that nice (in terms of how sturdy it feels) and is also on the shallow side. My husband threw the whole thing together in 30 minutes, but he is good at that type of thing. It definitely would have taken me longer. The colors are nice and it looks great in our kitchen. Glad we didn't go with something more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Susanna

customer_reviews.title: Overall good, drawer is useless
customer_reviews.text: This was easy enough to assemble, and I’m happy with the shelves and top. The drawer is really disappointing. The bottom is super thin and cheap fiberboard, and it sticks badly, making it a pain in the butt to open and close. It’s also really shallow. Honestly it’d be better without it-would give more height for storage on the top shelf. Besides that, I’m happy with it. It’s sturdy and a good size. I have a large convection toaster oven and a Keurig on the top, and storage bins on the shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Laub

customer_reviews.title: It’s good enough.
customer_reviews.text: The product came in packed very well. Installation was a breeze until I got to installing the top. The access to the hex screw is not ideal as you are not able to use a power driver and you have to use the manual L-shaped hex tool which could be a little annoying. The wood used for the two shelves are very soft. Be careful when using a power driver as you might overdo it. I think they should have used a thicker screw.
customer_reviews.author: macdd

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Sturdy Kitchen Island
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect kitchen island for small kitchens. It provides more counter space work area, extra storage due to the bottom shelves and also adds a little bit of flair to your kitchen. This island simply looks beautiful! My husband took about 30 minutes assembling it with no hassle. It's now in the middle of my kitchen and it's sturdy -- I've been using it everyday with no complaints. I purchased baskets for the bottom shelves to make it look even fancier. I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Super Shopper

customer_reviews.title: love the end result!
customer_reviews.text: let me start by saying i absolutely LOVE this island in my kitchen it’s gorgeous, holds a lot of storage, n pretty sturdy. however, it took foreverrrrr to get here like 2 weeks and the back panel came cracked in half :( i was able to super glue it back together, use wood filler, sand n paint it but was it worth doing all that? yes. i just wish it came not broken instead. nonetheless, i’d recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Nice solid table, but the drawer is a little chintzy
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints about the table other than the drawer isn't well made. For the price, it's absolutely worth it. Our kitchen isn't an "eat-in," but we still wanted a small table for two that would go flush against a wall and was bar height. This worked great. The shelves a sturdy, there's no wobble, and it was easy to assemble. Eventually the drawer will break, but that's easily fixable with a plywood bottom or center brace and 4 cheap brackets.
customer_reviews.author: The Maestro

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: For what it costs this kitchen island is pretty good. It looks nice and the parts are solid. The top is actually heavy and seems like it will last. They could have done a better job on the drawer as it doesn't slide in and out that smoothly but I guess they had to cut corners somewhere. Once assembled and moved to kitchen there was a bit of wobble but that may be due to my floor and I fixed it pretty easily. Would recommend as an inexpensive and functional kitchen addition
customer_reviews.author: techyoda

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I needed more counter and storage room in my kitchen. This is perfect. The second shelf holds my microwave with room to spare, leaving me the top for counter space. I bought baskets to go on the bottom shelf to store boxes of crackers, granola bars, and bags of popcorn and chips. It looks nice and tidy. It went together really well. All holes lined up well, and it wasn't a struggle to get pieces to fit together. I am really happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and Sturdy (got the Walnut version)
customer_reviews.text: This kitchen island is pretty solid. Made well. Its sturdy. The island is alright with storage. Bottom two shelves are open which is a pain if you have toddlers running around who like to grab things. The draw itself, its long (width wise) and long wise too.. not deep at all so, fill it with smaller things. Its nicely made too. Mine came a little damaged but not enough to warrant a return to be honest. I can see this island lasting a long time if its taken care of properly too. Overall its a really nice piece to have in any kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Best for Price
customer_reviews.text: I got this product expecting it to feel and look cheap because of the price... I am pleasantly surprised. I bought it to use as an "espresso bar" and it's perfect. It looks great, it's honestly very sturdy especially for the price. I received all the parts I needed to assemble it and it wasn't difficult (just follow the instructions lol.) No cracks, no broken pieces. Super impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Gabs

customer_reviews.title: Good value looks great despite some scratches
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with some shallow but long scratches in the top. Still a good value and looks great overall despite the scratches. Assembly was easy with a 20v drill and it is very sturdy. No issues with drawer on my unit - opens and closes smoothly on included plastic rollers. The drawer is cardboard bottom so only suitable for holding papers and light utensils. It is my new junk mail and coupon drawer.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Studio ain't got nuttin on me
customer_reviews.text: If you look at my pictures, you can see how small my kitchen is. I had about 6 appliances too many to fit in the tiny studio apartment kitchen. I was able to put it together myself and I am an old Korean lady with no handy skills. Looks great and holds the majority of my appliances and looks pretty against the wall. I use the drawers for my utensils. Total space saver :)
customer_reviews.author: Kimchi

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small apartment in senior housing where I had to downsize to a kitchen that is galley style and only one person can be in it at a time. This has change the whole look at my apartment and made the kitchen look like a kitchen. It is 30 it looks like a paid way more for than I did. And is the first thing people complement when they walk into my apartment
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my island!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome island! Assembly was easy, I managed it by myself with no problems, and it is so very sturdy. I have even stood on it while changing a light bulb, and it didnt even wiggle. I love the open shelves, and the drawer is the perfect size, not too deep so items dont get lost, but still holds tons of stuff. The towel bar is a nice touch, I just wish there were one at both ends since I've discovered how handy it is. The island is a good working height, it works for my at my short 5 foot 4 inches, and equally well for my 5 foot 11 inch husband.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The front piece of the drawer came with 2 cracks in it. The drawer rails are bent so cannot use it. Disappointed for the price expected better quality. I’m not sure how to return it since it’s all put together now.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Great, inexpensive table.
customer_reviews.text: Nice table for the laundry room. Sturdy enough, solid. Great value for the price. Per another review, wait to tighten everything until mostly assembled and you should have no issue with things lining up. Drawer won’t hold much-don’t expect a new junk drawer! But a few small, lightweight items will be tucked away. Very pleased with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Trish Burgin

customer_reviews.title: Love this cart!
customer_reviews.text: This cart has been a lifesaver. I recently moved into a tiny studio apartment with the smallest kitchenette imaginable with NO counter space (I cried the first time I saw the kitchen). Meal prep was impossible. I was desperate for storage/organization solutions. This product was perfect. It’s the right height and easily moved around as necessary. Assembly was easy - take it out of the box, unfold it and the shelves snap into place (I’m 71 and had no problem). Can you tell I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when this came in (I fricken LOVE 2 day shipping!) I searched so many websites and this was the kitchen counter top that met my criteria AND at the best price. I love the drawer! It’s very big a spacious! There was a slight wobble After we finished building but TBH this could have been because of my wood floors. I added a felt pad to the front right leg to offset the height and it worked perfectly. I wasn’t able to slide my Roobma under this at first but I used 4 more felt pads and it worked perfectly! I love this piece!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I have an incredibly small kitchen, like tiny. I needed an island style compartment with at least one drawer, and this thing worked perfect! I easily have my microwave on top and still have plenty of space to prepare food and such. The drawer as well has graduated into my junk drawer, as while it is shallow in height, there is a lot of horizontal space in it. Also, the height of this matches rather well for stoves and such, so it is nearly a perfect fit for my stoves side counter of sorts. The best part though is that the assembly was on point and is super sturdy, probably more so than my other furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy shopper
customer_reviews.text: This is a great purchase. I'm a 62 year old woman and I put it together myself in less than an hour. It's very solid and stable. It holds a lot of things on the bottom shelves. The top is perfect for rolling out dough, chopping veggies or mixing up a batch of anything. I'm so glad I got it. It's very well packed and arrives quickly. You won't be sorry you ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Micky

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but it’s cheap.
customer_reviews.text: So this table is nice and looks good in my kitchen but the materials are cheap. The wood is very soft making it easy to dent and chip and you also have to be careful not to over tighten the skews or they will strip. Also the tabletop portion is not a cutting surface which would have been nice. All in all I’d say this product is ok but not great.
customer_reviews.author: Keven

customer_reviews.title: Game changer for small kitchen space.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great for my small kitchen. Really changed my world by giving me another counter space basically. It was pretty easy to put together and it is VERY STURDY!! I do have one complaint-the drawer is large but very shallow and not that useful for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Lucchese

customer_reviews.title: Great island
customer_reviews.text: I love this island. I was looking at the more expensive ones and then decided to settle on this after reading reviews. I had no problems at all putting this together. My 4 and 6 year old girls helped me. It's sturdy and is perfect for my space. Totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle A.

customer_reviews.title: Serviceable, pretty kitchen island with a few flaws!
customer_reviews.text: This kitchen island was quite easy to put together, and was helped by the addition of a drill (rather than using the provided L to screw things in). However, the pull out draw jumps its tracks if you pull even a little hard, and the finish on the top is scuffed in places and feels very plastic-y. It's not perfect, but it's pretty and a nice height.
customer_reviews.author: wheelerk

customer_reviews.title: The search is over!
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the negative reviews I was a bit worried about purchasing this island. But everything fit together perfectly, there were no imperfections and I am in love with this product. After searching for days from site to site for the perfect medium sized island, I really got my bang for my buck. I intend to put wheels on it eventually but it’s light weight enough I can move it on my own. Over all 10/10!!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah jacoby

customer_reviews.title: nice addition to my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: i tried wayfiar and ikea but this was the best hard top island for the price. I love that you can see it in your kitchen before you buy with augmented reality. I took off a star because it is a little wobbly. Leaning it against a wall and putting the microwave on top helped. Also the drawer was sticking every time I opened so i had to add a little spray grease and work it in well. Some of the paint came off of the slides in the area where it was stiff but that helped it slide a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan L. Moon

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, holds a lot.
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping. My husband put this together without much difficultly. I use this as a 2nd work station. I holds all my canisters, baking items, extra appliances - food processor, instant pot, air fryer and accessories. Lots of storage and workspace for me, a little bit higher than expected as I am short but I can work with it. Nice finish, fits in with my New England decor. Planning on buying a second island for additional usage and cookbook storage. In love with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Hubis

customer_reviews.title: Nice clean looking side table for a causual kitchen
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived on time and undamaged I put this together in about 2 hours by myself The worst part was screwing in the screws for the wooden top. It seems fairly sturdy, though I would not put anything heavy in the drawer. I will likely replace the handle on the drawer to something a little nicer. I have it at the end of my counter for extra countertop space. It sits about 1/4 inch higher than my countertops. I may grind down the table legs at the bottom if I feel this is an issue. Not top quality, but fine for an apartment or casual space.
customer_reviews.author: Juya

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a work table in my wife’s craft rook (sewing, quilting). It was exactly what we were looking for at a reasonable price. The only issue during assembly was the incorrect labels on the side pieces on the drawer. The labels were reversed, which would have made the drawer inoperable. The screws that hold the frame together are drilled into wood, not a nut-and-bolt construction, so there will conceivably be some long-term stability issues. But, for the moment, all is good.
customer_reviews.author: Clark Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Table top partially teared apart
customer_reviews.text: The product in total looks very pretty but came with table top partially apart which is major part of the set. I already put together chairs and when it's complete it's hard to take them apart and send back. I'm really disappointed because it seems like they don't have any quality control. I chose this one cause it fits good in my small kitchen and goes well with island that I bought from same seller (and which is great). Also one of the chairs had small scratch, but that's not an issue that compromise quality like the table top problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Not very happy.
customer_reviews.text: It’s not a good quality product but it’s cheap then. It depends for what you are gonna use it. The drawer as you can see in the picture already come out. I tried to scroll it again but the holes were already loose. I had to put a double tape to sustain it. It shakes a little bit it’s not to stable. It has a good store capacity, you put an air fryer, microwave, and couple of things. I would give 3 star so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Ardito

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the white one, but after it arrived I decided I wanted to refinish all my kitchen furniture from white to red. So I painted it and stained the top. It went together rather easily. The drawer doesn't fit as snuggly as I would like - the gaps on the sides of the drawer are larger than they probably should be - but I think it was due to my assembly skills and not so much the product itself. I purchased new hardware for it (drawer handle and towel bar) and so far it has been working great!
customer_reviews.author: zoey.fritz

customer_reviews.title: Missing handle/broken pieces
customer_reviews.text: Product was broken. Little price of wood chipped off and we glued it back on. Additionally one of the slated bottom pieces came loose. Again glued back down. Finally it did not come with a handle for the drawer and no towel rack for the side but has the holes and is referenced on the instructions. We’ll be going to Home Depot to purchase them. If we didn’t already assemble the damned thing we’d return it. Does seem fairly sturdy however. For the price not horrible. Just wish I didn’t have to invest in pieces that should have come.
customer_reviews.author: Kashay Agyeman

customer_reviews.title: I had to use crazy glue!
customer_reviews.text: I had to use crazy glue to keep this thing together because the nails weren't doing it's jobs. I think the holes they made for the nails weren't tight enough and also not shaped like the nails. I'm not sure how sturdy this will end up being. I wouldn't recommend buying this at all.
customer_reviews.author: colorific gal

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great printer stand
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cart. It is very sturdy, was easy to put together, And makes a perfect printer stand. I liked the height of the shelves because I wanted to use wooden crates. It easily fits them on the shelves. The drawer is a little flimsy and awkward pulling it in and out, but other than that this is very nice item. There are no rubber stops or padding on the underneath of the feet so you may want to add those.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen F

customer_reviews.title: Allen wrench too short to attach top
customer_reviews.text: I got everything but the top assembled easily in less than an hour. I tried multiple times to use the short side of the Allen wrench to attach the top and so far I've had no luck. The short end bumps into the drawer slide. I'm not sure that I'll be able to attach the top which defeats the purpose of purchasing this. Will you please send a shorter Allen wrench, or do you have other suggestions? Signed, frustrated
customer_reviews.author: elongp

customer_reviews.title: quite sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This island is more sturdy then I expected. Heavy, solid and smooth. The assembly is a bit slow and positionally difficult but does go together per directions. The drawer isn't fitting as snuggly as I would like but I will take a look at the runner to be sure it is secured properly. Otherwise I am quite impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Good Value
customer_reviews.text: My husband put it together in 30 minutes. The only glitch is that drawer!! It is warped & impossible to get to stay in place. We decided that we didn’t need that flimsy drawer & moved on! Bottom line, I am very pleased with the size, quality & sturdiness of unit. Microwave & Keurig on top, toaster oven on middle shelf, & Nespresso accessories, mixer, & bread board on bottom. I have a small valley kitchen. But now I have freed up a bunch of counter space for food prep!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Darby

customer_reviews.title: Uh oh! Striation!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking well constructed island and meets my needs perfectly. However, several stria have appeared on the top. There are four distinct narrow grooves none of which were caused by a cut. Because the return date is 30 days after delivery it’s too late to do that. But I don’t really want to return it, I’d just like to have a new top because I fear more stria may appear and if moisture gets into them it could cause serious damage.
customer_reviews.author: Boyce S.

customer_reviews.title: Useful and attractive
customer_reviews.text: I like the real wood top a lot. Fairly easy to assemble if you take your time, pay special attention to the drawer. Light enough to move occasionally, Could mount glides without much trouble. The white finish is even, smooth and easy to clean. I think this is a good value for what things cost today. My only disappointment is that the drawer is not quite deep enough for many kitchen thing you would want to keep in it.
customer_reviews.author: Zoaster

customer_reviews.title: Nice but imperfect. Just like me.
customer_reviews.text: I am going to start with the bad. All done, one leg is 1/4 shorter than the rest. Had to go to the hardware store for a chair leg pad. That said, it's a nice piece. No chips. Looks good. Reasonably easy to assemble. Sturdy now that I propped up that leg. It was a bit of a bummer to get done and have it wobble.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon LA

customer_reviews.title: So far, I am LOVING this!
customer_reviews.text: I am truly enjoying this kitchen work island. I use it daily for chopping up veggies and preparing meals in my very small kitchen, and it has been extremely useful. In fact, this unit alone has made my kitchen actually a good place to be! It was fairly easy for me (alone) to put together. The only difficult / time-consuming part of assembly was screwing on the wood top, which required contorting one's wrist and fingers in difficult positions. But it looks great and works quite well (except the drawer occasionally gets 'stuck' when I am pulling it out).
customer_reviews.author: just me

customer_reviews.title: Excellent piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this Cabinet!! Super sturdy & beautiful! No scratches or imperfections upon arrival. Assembled it myself in about an hour (girl). I'm still impressed with how sturdy it is! The 1 drawer is very shallow, & I wouldn't try to cram it full of heavy stuff. Other than that, I could be more pleased!
customer_reviews.author: K. Thacker

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the drawer
customer_reviews.text: We don’t gave much cabinet or drawer space in our kitchen so we bought this to use as countertop space, open storage and a drawer to keep our silverware in. I love it and it would normally be 5 stars but the drawer is not really meant for any sort of storage besides towels. Everything else is built great but the drawer is not very deep and doesn’t open all the way without coming off of the tracks so it’s hard to get silverware out without the whole drawer crashing into my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Carley

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen island
customer_reviews.text: We use this as an island in our kitchen! We painted it green and it looks so great. My only complaint is that the drawer sometimes catches when you try to close it and you have to readjust and try again. Knowing that, I'd probably still repurchase it if something happened to it because I like it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Hard to set up
customer_reviews.text: Hard to set up because: - a couple of the parts (G and H) were mislabeled so I put it together wrong and had to disassemble and reassemble. - the predrilled holes were wrong on one of the wooden stick guidelines things so I literally had to shave it down! - it's hard to attach the top because of the crazy awkward angle you have to use + you have to use the included tool not a drill because of the angle. And the wood is super soft and brittle like the other review said. All that said, it looks good and I think it will be just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, bad design.
customer_reviews.text: Fasteners made no sense, majority of them would strip out the screw holes. I was not able to tighten them fully without them stripping. Build quality of wood parts was nice, but no way to reinforce the screws that were loose. Had to use wood glue on the joints that were loose. Maybe cam bolts would have made more sense to keep everything together.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M. Gregorio Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Use wood glueto assemble and it will be much stronger later
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice unit and very easy to assemble. I had 2 holes that were over drilled and the screws would not tighten but with a few wood toothpicks it was easy to repair. I also used wood glue to keep it strong. I did not use the instruction but found an easy way to assemble by turning the top upside down on a work table then put the back on then the 2 sides then shelves that’s it except putting the drawer together and glued that
customer_reviews.author: SPURSEL

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and quality appliance cart for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a very sturdy and aesthetically pleasing kitchen cart. Instructions were easy to follow. I wish the drawer was deeper, and I wish the shelves had 2 inches more of height clearance (they’re only 12” tall shelves), but we changed our plan and made it work and overall are happy with it for freeing up some cabinet and counter space to house most of our appliances in one spot.
customer_reviews.author: Alea

customer_reviews.title: Great as an island or kitchen storage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kitchen to put my toaster oven and microwave on. It was easy to assemble and easily fit both appliances. The two additional shelves come in handy for organization. This was the best item i could find for the price after searching several stores and websites. I’m very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jwestie51

customer_reviews.title: Good for the $
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a microwave stand, and kitchen gadgets storage. Pretty easy to put together. Looks nice. The drawer is a little flimsy, would be better with 2 handles, instead of one in the middle. Good value for the money. Purchased knowing not a long term piece of furniture, good for a couple years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: Decent looking. Sturdy enough for most people. For my fat butt, not quite sturdy as I'd like. Also, the top is curved down slight and the bottom edge of countertop rubs against the top of the drawer when sliding the drawer in.. little annoying. The middle 2 layers have slots... looks good, but wish it was just solid, so it's stronger and stuff doesn't drop between the slots. For the money - eh, not good, not bad... it's ok
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Delivered with slight to considerable damage
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size etc that I was wanting but soooo disappointed in the way it arrived. Not sure if this happened on UPS’s end or at the supplier warehouse but so one had something heavy on center of the box cracking the top all the way through, bending the drawer slide and breaking a piece of wood away from the bottom leg on one side. Drawer will not close completely. Again perfect size and looks just like advertised but because of how it was treated before arriving at my home is in yard / garage sale qualify.
customer_reviews.author: James W

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking island - good storage - pretty easy to assemble - the only thing I will say is that the drawer doesn’t come in and out smoothly - gets caught up on the counter - putting the drawer together was probably the trickiest - in that the base would not stay in place whilst screwing in the sides - also - u will need a Phillips head screwdriver - something I didn’t have handy. All in all I am pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MK

product_meta.title: Casual Home Kitchen Island with Solid American Hardwood Top, White
product_meta.description: Color:Natural&white| Size:40"W| Style Name:Kitchen IslandThis Kitchen Island cart is the perfect addition to any kitchen that could use some extra counterspace. Its details are manifested in the beautiful finish of the solid wood. 2 shelves and a drawer provide multiple ways to keep your kitchen organized and all of your cooking essentials close at hand.
feature_bullets: Solid wood top for increased durability and longevity contrasts with the clean white finish seamlessly
Convenient drawer pulls with a stainless steel handle to provide an enclosed space to keep your kitchen essentials
Two (2) spacious lower shelves provide ample storage space for your kitchen essentials
Stainless steel towel rack is a convenient place to hang your towels
Dimensions: 36.5 inches high x 20 inches deep x 40 inches wide: Weight: 50.25 pounds

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,928 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
